titleStmt.title: The lusty lad of London: or, The pleasant wooing betwixt brawny Will a wine-cooper, and a wealthy merchant's fair widow. To the tune of, A soldier and a sailor.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J[onah]. Deacon, at the Angel in Guilspur-street.,

notesStmt.note: Publisher's name and date of publication from Wing.
